update rf_user_pad
pad_id = (case when pad_id is null then #{record.padId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else pad_id + #{record.padId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_online_time = (case when left_online_time is null then #{record.leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_online_time + #{record.leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_control_time = (case when left_control_time is null then #{record.leftControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_control_time + #{record.leftControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
total_online_time = (case when total_online_time is null then #{record.totalOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else total_online_time + #{record.totalOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
total_control_time = (case when total_control_time is null then #{record.totalControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else total_control_time + #{record.totalControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
pad_control_count = (case when pad_control_count is null then #{record.padControlCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else pad_control_count + #{record.padControlCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
user_id = (case when user_id is null then #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else user_id + #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_recovery_day = (case when left_recovery_day is null then #{record.leftRecoveryDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_recovery_day + #{record.leftRecoveryDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

update rf_user_pad set expire_time = (expire_time + ${afterDays}), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = now() where pad_grade = #{padGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exists (select 1 from rf_pad rp where pad_id = rp.pad_id and rp.idc_id = #{idcId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update rf_user_pad set expire_time = (expire_time + ${afterHours}), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = now() where pad_grade = #{padGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exists (select 1 from rf_pad rp where pad_id = rp.pad_id and rp.idc_id = #{idcId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update rf_user_pad set expire_time = (expire_time + ${afterMinutes}), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = now() where pad_grade = #{padGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exists (select 1 from rf_pad rp where pad_id = rp.pad_id and rp.idc_id = #{idcId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update rf_user_pad
pad_id = (case when pad_id is null then #{padId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else pad_id + #{padId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_online_time = (case when left_online_time is null then #{leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_online_time + #{leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_control_time = (case when left_control_time is null then #{leftControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_control_time + #{leftControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
total_online_time = (case when total_online_time is null then #{totalOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else total_online_time + #{totalOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
total_control_time = (case when total_control_time is null then #{totalControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else total_control_time + #{totalControlTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
pad_control_count = (case when pad_control_count is null then #{padControlCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else pad_control_count + #{padControlCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
user_id = (case when user_id is null then #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else user_id + #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_recovery_day = (case when left_recovery_day is null then #{leftRecoveryDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_recovery_day + #{leftRecoveryDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
where user_pad_id = #{userPadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
